content: work from bottom rib and up back and forth the sleeves is knitted in a round size 0-3 6 9 12 mo measurements half chest 23 5 25 5 27 29 5 cm center back length 25 31 5 35 5 39 cm sleeve length 15 17 19 21 cm yarn golder fleece carders - cottton you can find the yarn here https //www gfcarders com/yarns/cotton-yarn-classic html yarn amount 100g 100g 150g 150g gauge 23sts per 10cm needle size 3mm and 3 5mm 60cm circular needle and double pont needle
